subject: Steroids
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Boston Red Sox pitcher Curt Schilling called on Roger Clemens to give up the four Cy Young Awards he won after 1997 if he cannot clear his name from allegations that he used steroids to prolong and enhance his career.
snippet: Boston Red Sox pitcher Curt Schilling called on Roger Clemens to give up the four Cy Young Awards he won after 1997 if he cannot clear his name from allegations that he used steroids to prolong and enhance his career.
